level.text: The Board may issue a license to an applicant who:
Is currently licensed and in good standing under the laws of another state with standards which are substantially equivalent to the requirements of the District of Columbia laws and regulations;
Has at least three (3) years of current practice as a nursing home administrator;
Has passed the District examination; and
Has forwarded to the Board at least (3) letters of recommendation by persons who can attest to the applicant’s qualifications as they pertain to the practice of nursing home administration.
